title: Newly Renovated*Gorgeous 2 bed*1/2 FEE!*HEAT & HW Inc*B line*laundry*
posting_body: This freshly painted, modern, newly renovated unit is not to be missed.
It's steps away from the Chiswick Green B T stop.
It's only 1/2 MONTH FEE! & HEAT & HOT WATER is INCLUDED.
You have your own personal front facing porch as well.
There's laundry facilities in the building.
High ceilings and gleaming hardwood floors.
Brand new appliances.
Spacious with lots of natural light.
Common areas of the apartment building look fabulous.
You should be the person to Christen this unit.
Contact me today for a showing.
